text: A Safe Place is a 1971 American drama movie. It was directed by Henry Jaglom. Actors include Orson Welles, Jack Nicholson, Tuesday Weld, Philip Proctor, and Francesca Hilton. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. The movie did not make much money in ticket sales. ==Other websites== * Category:1971 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American independent movies
title: A Safe Place
